'''Glutton For Punishment''' is a [[Badges|badge]] that can be obtained by playing the mission [[Measure Is Unceasing]] on the island of [[Memory of the Grand Design]].

Objective: <big style="color:yellow">Provoke 2 Prognosticars at the same time with only 1 crewmate.</big>
